about_the_game:
It's bacon day on the farm and it's time for Piggy and his farm animal friends to escape the farm for good! Piggy Chase is a 3D runner where you form a conga-line of farm animal friends, dodge crazy tractors, runaway city buses and evil snowmen to weave through mazes without falling off the edge to lead Piggy on an adventure to escape the farm and find a new home. Run through low-poly 3D levels filled with tricky ledges and traps while getting other farm animals to follow you for extra points. The will include 10 unique levels with different themes including a farm, a city, a snow world, a lava world and more.

Features

  • Cute Low Poly Art
  • Deceptively Simple game / Hard to master!
  • Unstoppable pig! (literally, he can't stop running!)
  • At least 8 types of farm animals to save!
  • Piglets!
